articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: China beats South Korea to win Women's Asian Cup - The Washington Post
articles.description: China came from two goals down to defeat South Korea 3-2 on Sunday and win the Women’s Asian Cup for a record ninth time
articles.content: At half-time I told the players not to give up as anything can happen in 45 minutes, said China coach Shui Qingxia, who won the title five times as a player. We are delighted to win the title and we … [+1536 chars]

articles.title: Capital A offers new hope for retrenched employees through airasia grocer - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (Feb 6): Capital A Bhd is rehiring employees it had to retrench in 2020 through its subsidiary airasia grocer, an online grocery shopping platform that matches local farmers and grocery merchants to consumers. AirAsia grocer chief executive offic…

articles.title: AFC Women's Asian Cup: All-female match officials appointed for summit clash - ANI News
articles.description: Navi Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], February 5 (ANI): An all-female cast of match officials have been appointed for the AFC Women's Asian Cup India 2022 final between China PR and Korea Republic at the D.Y. Patil Stadium on Sunday.
